title: alastantiger
author: alastantiger
content: Since there is such a strong gambling community here and members have exchanged ideas, discussed many gambling-related subjects, and offered advice and recommendations, I suppose it would be appropriate to bring up this topic as well.The simple question is this -  What do you believe to be the finest holiday gift to offer a fellow gambler?

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 25, 2022, 07:44:58 PMThe simple question is this -  What do you believe to be the finest holiday gift to offer a fellow gambler?Gift him some btc balance or any altcoin that he or she may want to gamble. If you don't have time, just like the typical gift of money will certainly suffice.But if you want it to be memorable and you want him to use something then some tumbler or mug while gambling to have something to drink is also a good idea.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 25, 2022, 07:44:58 PMThe simple question is this -  What do you believe to be the finest holiday gift to offer a fellow gambler?Gamblers gift themselves stuff everyday, most especially when the win some really good amount of money, i have some friends here i gamble with, most times i win, we both hang out, share brings, gist and have a good time, and if money is really big, i do hand over some cash to them to get whatever they want.Best gifts gamblers give to their fellow gambler is during a good win, not in festive period as this, at a holiday period as it is currently, i think is the best gift to gift to a fellow gambler is hanging out, sharing drinks, gisting and having fun, any material gift i would give to a fellow gambler is if i am lucky to win a good game.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: A gambler would like to go to a thematic casino he hasn't been before, possibly in another region or country, with accommodation, transportation and food included on the package. It's a very expensive gift to give someone, but that is an ideal one many must dream about. On the other hand, there are cheaper gifts possibilities as well:A simple credit of few hundreds of dollar for a gambler to play at the casino of his preference would be already a very welcome surprise for most of them in this Holidays' season.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: There is one friend I know who gambles almost every day. The best gift I can suggest giving him os Bitcoin. It is way better than giving a scratcher tickets or bottles of alcohol. Owning Bitcoin is a gamble, this gambling friend will really enjoy it. This way they can see the ups and downs of what is the big risk that gamblers can see. Bitcoin is an exponential industry that is growing, most importantly having knowledge of cryptocurrency can support gamblers. Your friend will be bestowed in a brighter future with a gift that can flourish, and your friend will absolutely appreciate it.
